events.name: Los Angeles Dodgers at Chicago Cubs

highlights.headline: Shohei Ohtani scores on error to put Dodgers ahead
highlights.description: Shohei Ohtani crosses home on an error to give the Dodgers a 2-1 lead over the Cubs in Japan.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Shohei Ohtani scores on error to put Dodgers ahead) 2025/03/18 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Yoshinobu Yamamoto threw five strong innings, Shohei Ohtani had two hits and scored twice, and the defending World Series champion Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Chicago Cubs 4-1 on Tuesday in Major League Baseball's season opener at the Tokyo Dome.
headlines.shortLinkText: Yamamoto, Ohtani deliver in return to Japan, Dodgers beat the Cubs 4-1 in season opener

video.headline: Shohei Ohtani scores on error to put Dodgers ahead

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Shohei Ohtani scores on error to put Dodgers ahead) 2025/03/18 ESHEET

events.name: Boston Red Sox at New York Yankees

highlights.headline: Anthony Volpe knocks in a run for Yankees
highlights.description: Yankees retake the lead with an Anthony Volpe RBI single up the middle in the bottom of the sixth inning vs. Boston.

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Anthony Volpe knocks in a run for Yankees) 2025/03/18 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Javier Rivas walks it off for the Pirates in the 9th
